Summary: large red ball shape, huge. Then faded into a tiny black ball and was gone.
divs: Sighting DetailsSitting on the swing and noticed it appear from the north and i told my husband, do you see that. He said what is that, what is that, what is that, etc.... We were shocked. never seen anything like it before. It was there for about twenty seconds and just diminshed in size to a black dot and was gone. Unbelievable, we would of never believed something like that was out there, until we both saw it together. I am so glad he was there. I may of thought i was hallucinating.
